author: mari65
created_time: June 25, 2022, 10:49:01 PMLast edit: June 26, 2022, 10:28:54 AM by mari65
content: Hey all,I filed a Chapter 13 Bankruptcy plan last October and have been making my bi-weekly payments via Bank Account. However, due to unforeseen circumstances, I have to have Surgery and my kiddos are needing to start Occupational Therapy. Is there anyway to either:A. Lower my monthly cost for a tiny bit to pay for these thingsORB. Dismiss payments for a bit?Otherwise, there isn't anyway to pay for these things =/ Thanks in advance!
